first_interaction.speaker: Benjamin
first_interaction.text: Hello! Ngayon lang kita nakita dito. May hinahanap ka ba o nag-eexplore ka lang?

first_interaction.speaker: Benjamin
first_interaction.text: Kung may kailangan ka o may problema kang gustong ipaalam, nandito lang ako.

repeated_interaction.speaker: Benjamin
repeated_interaction.text: Uy, ikaw na naman! Kumusta ang mga nangyari saâ€™yo?

repeated_interaction.speaker: Benjamin
repeated_interaction.text: Huwag kang mahihiya, sabihin mo lang kung may kailangan ka pa.
